gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AcquisitionCostsPaid` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `CashFlowStatementMethodType` is equal to `Indirect`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA11_CashFlowStatementMethodType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA11_CashFlowStatementMethodType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA11_AcquisitionCostsPaid')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA11_AcquisitionCostsPaid return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_AdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_AdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfAdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivitiesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfAdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivitiesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfAdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivitiesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfAdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivitiesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AmortisationAcquisitionCosts` SHOULD NOT be reported, because the reported value of `CashFlowStatementMethodType` is equal to `Direct`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA24_CashFlowStatementMethodType')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA24_CashFlowStatementMethodType return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA24_AmortisationAcquisitionCosts')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA24_AmortisationAcquisitionCosts return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
